problem.markdown:
This a multiple-choice problem. You will choose just one response, receiving credit for the right answer.
>>Select a vowel from the list below.<< (x) A ( ) B ( ) C ( ) D (x) E
|| There are two correct answers. ||
[explanation] A, E, I, O, and U are vowels in English. Y is sometimes a vowel. [explanation]

multiplechoiceresponse.p: This a multiple-choice problem. You will choose just one response, receiving credit for the right answer.
multiplechoiceresponse.label: Select a vowel from the list below.

div.p: A, E, I, O, and U are vowels in English. Y is sometimes a vowel.
